00056 class PgOptionsSAXHandler : public XERCES_CPP_NAMESPACE::HandlerBase

00062         AffxString m_strPrevCategory;
00063         AffxString m_strAnalysis;
00064 
00065 public :
00066         PgOptionsSAXHandler(PgOptions* pPgOptions, std::vector<std::string>& vFileNames) : 
00067                 m_pPgOptions(pPgOptions), m_pvFileNames(&vFileNames), m_uiOptionCount(0) 
00068         {
00069                 if (m_pPgOptions == NULL) {Err::errAbort("PgOptionsSAXHandler must be constructed with a valid PgOptions pointer.");}
00070         }

00073     unsigned int getOptionCount() const {return m_uiOptionCount;}

00076         void error(const XERCES_CPP_NAMESPACE::SAXParseException& exc) {Err::errAbort(toString(exc.getMessage()));}
00077         void fatalError(const XERCES_CPP_NAMESPACE::SAXParseException& exc) {Err::errAbort(toString(exc.getMessage()));}

00079         void startDocument() {m_uiOptionCount = 0;}
00080 
00081         void endDocument()
00082         {
00083                 if (m_strAnalysis != "")
00084                 {
00085                         Verbose::out(1, "\tanalysis = " + m_strAnalysis);
00086                         if (m_pPgOptions->mustFindOpt("analysis")->m_allowMultiple)
00087                         {
00088                                 m_pPgOptions->push("analysis", m_strAnalysis);
00089                         }
00090                         else
00091                         {
00092                                 m_pPgOptions->set("analysis", m_strAnalysis);
00093                         }
00094                 }
00095         }
00096 
00097         static std::string toString(const XMLCh* const in)
00098         {
00099                 char* p = XERCES_CPP_NAMESPACE::XMLString::transcode(in);
00100                 AffxString str = p;
00101                 XERCES_CPP_NAMESPACE::XMLString::release(&p);
00102                 return str.trim();
00103         }

00106         void startElement(const XMLCh* const name, XERCES_CPP_NAMESPACE::AttributeList& attributes)
00107         {
00108                 std::string strElementName = toString(name);
00109 //              Verbose::out(1, "Element=" + strElementName);
00110                 m_uiOptionCount++;
00111                 AffxString strCategoryName;
00112                 std::string strOptionName;
00113                 std::string strDescription;
00114                 std::string strCurrentValue;
00115                 std::string strGuid;
00116                 for (unsigned int iIndex = 0; (iIndex < attributes.getLength()); iIndex++)
00117                 {
00118                         std::string strAttributeName = toString(attributes.getName(iIndex));
00119                         std::string strAttributeType = toString(attributes.getType(iIndex));
00120                         std::string strAttributeValue = toString(attributes.getValue(iIndex));
00121 //                      Verbose::out(1, "AttributeName=" + strAttributeName + ", AttributeType=" + strAttributeType + ", AttributeValue=" + strAttributeValue);
00122                         if ((strElementName == "ParameterFile") && (strAttributeName == "guid")) 
00123                         {
00124                                 Verbose::out(1, "\tguid = " + strAttributeValue);
00125                                 if (m_pPgOptions->getXMLParameterFileGuid() == "")
00126                                 {
00127                                         m_pPgOptions->m_strXMLParameterFileGuid = strAttributeValue; 
00128                                 }
00129                                 break;
00130                         }                       
00131                         else if ((strElementName == "JobOrder") && (strAttributeName == "joGUID")) 
00132                         {
00133                                 Verbose::out(1, "\tguid = " + strAttributeValue);
00134                                 if (m_pPgOptions->getXMLParameterFileGuid() == "")
00135                                 {
00136                                         m_pPgOptions->m_strXMLParameterFileGuid = strAttributeValue; 
00137                                 }
00138                                 break;
00139                         }
00140                         else if (strAttributeName == "analysis") {strCategoryName = strAttributeValue;}
00141                         else if (strAttributeName == "name") {strOptionName = strAttributeValue;}
00142                         else if (strAttributeName == "description") {strDescription = strAttributeValue;}
00143                         else if (strAttributeName == "currentValue") {strCurrentValue = strAttributeValue;}
00144                 }
00145                 if (strElementName == "Parameter")
00146                 {
00147                         if (strCategoryName != "")
00148                         {
00149                                 if (!m_pPgOptions->isOptDefined("analysis")) 
00150                                 {
00151                                         Verbose::out(1, "Specified option is not defined. Name: " + strOptionName);
00152                                 }
00153                                 else
00154                                 {
00155                                         if (strCategoryName != m_strPrevCategory)
00156                                         {
00157                                                 if (m_strAnalysis != "")
00158                                                 {
00159                                                         Verbose::out(1, "\tanalysis = " + m_strAnalysis);
00160                                                         if (m_pPgOptions->mustFindOpt("analysis")->m_allowMultiple)
00161                                                         {
00162                                                                 m_pPgOptions->push("analysis", m_strAnalysis);
00163                                                         }
00164                                                         else
00165                                                         {
00166                                                                 m_pPgOptions->set("analysis", m_strAnalysis);
00167                                                         }
00168                                                 }
00169                                                 if (strCurrentValue == "")
00170                                                 {
00171                                                         m_strAnalysis = strOptionName;
00172                                                 }
00173                                         }
00174                                         else
00175                                         {
00176                                                 if (strCurrentValue != "")
00177                                                 {
00178         //                                              if (::getInt(::getInt(strCurrentValue)) == strCurrentValue)
00179         //                                              {
00180         //                                                      m_strAnalysis += "." + strOptionName + "=" + strCurrentValue;
00181         //                                              }
00182         //                                              else
00183         //                                              {
00184                                                                 m_strAnalysis += "." + strOptionName + "='" + strCurrentValue + "'";
00185         //                                              }
00186                                                 }
00187                                         }
00188                                         m_strPrevCategory = strCategoryName;
00189                                 }
00190                         }
00191                         else
00192                         {
00193                                 if (m_pPgOptions->isOptDefined(strOptionName))
00194                                 {
00195                                         Verbose::out(1, "\t" + strOptionName + " = " + strCurrentValue);
00196                                         if ((strOptionName == "xml-file") || (strOptionName == "xml-file-append-only")) {
00197                                                 m_pPgOptions->setOptionsFromXMLFile(strCurrentValue, *m_pvFileNames);
00198                                         }
00199                                         else 
00200                                         {
00201                                                 if (m_pPgOptions->mustFindOpt(strOptionName)->m_allowMultiple)
00202                                                 {
00203                                                         m_pPgOptions->push(strOptionName, strCurrentValue);
00204                                                 }
00205                                                 else
00206                                                 {
00207                                                         m_pPgOptions->set(strOptionName, strCurrentValue);
00208                                                 }
00209                                         }
00210                                 }
00211                                 else 
00212                                 {
00213                                         Verbose::out(1, "Specified option is not defined. Name: " + strOptionName);
00214                                 }
00215                         }
00216                 }
00217         }
00218 };

00228 PgOpt::PgOpt() {
00229   // set to known starting values.
00230   m_shortName="";
00231   m_longName="";
00232   m_help="";
00233   m_type=PgOpt::INVALID_OPT;
00234   m_defaultValue="";
00235   m_values.resize(0);
00236   // default is no multiples
00237   m_allowMultiple=0;
00238   m_nohelp = false;
00239 }

00246   m_defaultValue= orig->m_defaultValue;
00247   m_values=       orig->m_values;
00248   m_allowMultiple=orig->m_allowMultiple;
00249   m_nohelp=       orig->m_nohelp;
00250 }

00268 bool PgOpt::isSet() {
00269   // when the user supplies a value, is it stored in m_values with "setValue".
00270   // we can see if the user supplied a value by checking the size of the vector.
00271   return (m_values.size()!=0);

00279 int PgOpt::getValueCount() const {
00280   return (int)m_values.size();
00281 }
00282 
00283 std::vector<std::string> PgOpt::getValueVector() const {
00284   return m_values;
00285 }
00286 
00287 std::string PgOpt::getValue(size_t idx) const {
00288   // off the end.
00289   if (idx<0) {
00290     Err::errAbort("Out of bounds. (idx<0)");
00291   }
00292   // No value was set with setValue; return the default value.
00293   if (m_values.size()==0) {
00294     return getDefaultValue();
00295   }
00296   // return the user? value set from the command line.
00297   if (idx<m_values.size()) {
00298     return m_values[idx];
00299   }
00300   // opps
00301   Err::errAbort("Out of bounds. (idx>size)");
00302   return string("internal error");
00303 }
00304 //
00305 bool PgOpt::getValueBool(int idx) const {
00306   return Convert::toBool(getValue(idx));
00307 }
00308 int PgOpt::getValueInt(int idx) const {
00309   return Convert::toInt(getValue(idx));
00310 }
00311 double PgOpt::getValueDouble(int idx) const {
00312   return Convert::toDouble(getValue(idx));
00313 }

00315 void PgOpt::push_user_values_into(std::vector<std::string>& dest_vec)
00316 {
00317   for (size_t i=0;i<m_values.size();i++) {
00318     dest_vec.push_back(m_values[i]);
00319   }
00320 }
00321 
00322 void PgOpt::dump() const
00323 {
00324   printf("%-20s : ",m_longName.c_str());
00325   if (getValueCount()==0) {
00326     printf("<%s>",getValue(0).c_str());
00327   }
00328   else {
00329     int cnt=getValueCount();
00330     for (int i=0;i<cnt;i++) {
00331       printf("'%s'",getValue(i).c_str());
00332       if (i!=cnt-1) {
00333         printf(",");
00334       }
00335     }
00336   }
00337   printf("\n");
00338 }
00339 
00340 int PgOpt::checkParseIsOk(const std::string& value) const {
00341   bool success;
00342 
00343   if (m_type == INT_OPT) {
00344     Convert::toIntCheck(value, &success);
00345     if(!success) {
00346       Err::errAbort( "Argument for option: '" + m_longName + " (" + m_shortName + ") is not an integer: " + value);
00347     }
00348   }
00349   else if (m_type == DOUBLE_OPT) {
00350     Convert::toDoubleCheck(value, &success);
00351     if(!success) {
00352       Err::errAbort( "Argument for option: '" + m_longName + " (" + m_shortName + ") is not a double: " + value);
00353     }
00354   }
00355   // yes.
00356   return 1;
00357 }

00362 PgOptions::PgOptions() : m_pXMLAppendOpts(NULL) {

00370 void PgOptions::clear() {
00371   //
00372   m_progName = "";
00373   m_usageMsg = "";
00374   m_strXMLParameterFileName.clear();
00375   m_strXMLParameterFileGuid.clear();
00376   if ( m_pXMLAppendOpts != NULL ) {
00377     delete m_pXMLAppendOpts;
00378   }
00379   m_pXMLAppendOpts = NULL;
00380   
00381   //
00382   m_argv.clear();
00383   m_args.clear();
00384   //
00385   for (size_t i=0;i<m_option_vec.size();i++) {
00386     delete m_option_vec[i];
00387   }
00388   m_option_vec.clear();
00389   m_option_section.clear();
00390   m_option_map.clear();
00391   
00392 }
00393 
00394 PgOptions& PgOptions::operator=(const PgOptions &options) {
00395   if(this == &options) return *this;
00396 
00397   clear();
00398 
00399   m_progName = options.m_progName;
00400   m_argv = options.m_argv;
00401   m_args = options.m_args;
00402   m_usageMsg = options.m_usageMsg;
00403   //
00404   appendOptions(options);
00405   //
00406  return *this;
00407 }
00408 
00409 void PgOptions::appendOptions(const PgOptions &options)
00410 {
00411   // where do our options end?
00412   size_t initial_end=m_option_vec.size();
00413   // add all the new options.
00414   for(size_t i=0; i<options.m_option_vec.size(); i++) {
00415     addPgOpt(options.m_option_vec[i]);
00416   }
00417   // now add the section headings, adjusted for end.
00418   std::map<int,std::string>::const_iterator iter;
00419   for(iter = options.m_option_section.begin(); iter != options.m_option_section.end(); iter++) {
00420     m_option_section[initial_end+iter->first] = iter->second;
00421   }
00422 }
00423 
00424 PgOptions::PgOptions(const PgOptions &options) : m_pXMLAppendOpts(NULL) {
00425   m_progName = options.m_progName;
00426   m_argv = options.m_argv;
00427   m_args = options.m_args;
00428   m_usageMsg = options.m_usageMsg;
00429   m_strXMLParameterFileName=options.m_strXMLParameterFileName;
00430   m_strXMLParameterFileGuid=options.m_strXMLParameterFileGuid;
00431     
00432   for(size_t i=0; i<options.m_option_vec.size(); i++) {
00433       addPgOpt(options.m_option_vec[i]);
00434   }
00435 
00436   std::map<int,std::string>::const_iterator iter;
00437   for(iter = options.m_option_section.begin(); iter != options.m_option_section.end(); iter++) {
00438       m_option_section[iter->first] = iter->second;
00439   }
00440 }

00469 void PgOptions::setArgv(const char * const * const argv) {
00470   m_argv.clear();
00471 
00472   for (const char* const * arg=argv;*arg!=NULL;arg++) {
00473     m_argv.push_back(*arg);
00474   }
00475   //
00476   if (0<m_argv.size()) {
00477     m_progName=m_argv[0];
00478   }
00479 }
00480 
00481 std::string PgOptions::commandLine() {
00482   std::ostringstream stream;
00483   size_t m_argv_size=m_argv.size();
00484 
00485   if (0<m_argv_size) {
00486     stream << m_argv[0];
00487     for (size_t i=1;i<m_argv_size;i++) {
00488       stream << " ";
00489       stream << m_argv[i];
00490     }
00491   }
00492   return stream.str();
00493 }

00497 void PgOptions::clearValues() {
00498   for(unsigned int i = 0; i<m_option_vec.size(); i++) {
00499     m_option_vec[i]->clearValues();
00500   }
00501 }
00502 
00503 void PgOptions::bind(const std::string& opt_name,PgOpt* opt)
00504 {
00505   // dont add the null string.
00506   if (opt_name!="") {
00507     m_option_map[opt_name]=opt;
00508   }
00509 }
00510 
00511 PgOpt* PgOptions::addPgOpt(const PgOpt* opt)
00512 {
00513   // We didnt create this option so copy it.
00514   PgOpt* opt_copy=new PgOpt(opt);
00515   return addPgOpt_nocopy(opt_copy);
00516 }
00517 
00518 PgOpt* PgOptions::addPgOpt_nocopy(PgOpt* opt)
00519 {
00520   //
00521   opt->checkParseIsOk(opt->getDefaultValue());
00522   //
00523   optionMapIterator_t i = m_option_map.find(opt->m_longName);
00524   if(i!=m_option_map.end()) {
00525     Err::errAbort("Option '" + opt->m_longName + "' already defined.");
00526   }
00527   if(!opt->m_shortName.empty()) {
00528     i = m_option_map.find(opt->m_shortName);
00529     if(i!=m_option_map.end()) {
00530       Err::errAbort("Option '" + opt->m_shortName + "' already defined.");
00531     }
00532   }
00533   // we will eventually free every opt in this vector.
00534   m_option_vec.push_back(opt);
00535   //
00536   bind(opt->m_longName,opt);
00537   bind(opt->m_shortName,opt);
00538   //
00539   return opt;
00540 }
00541 
00542 void PgOptions::defineOptionSection(const std::string &sectionName) {
00543   m_option_section[(int)m_option_vec.size()] = sectionName;
00544 }
00545 
00546 PgOpt* PgOptions::defineOption(const std::string& shortName,
00547                                const std::string& longName,
00548                                PgOpt::PgOptType_t type,
00549                                const std::string& help,
00550                                const std::string& defaultValue,
00551                                const bool noHelp)
00552 {
00553   PgOpt* opt=new PgOpt;
00554   // copy all the data
00555   opt->m_shortName=shortName;
00556   opt->m_longName=longName;
00557   opt->m_type=type;
00558   opt->m_help=help;
00559   opt->m_defaultValue=defaultValue;
00560   opt->m_values.resize(0);
00561   opt->m_nohelp = noHelp;
00562   // add
00563   return addPgOpt_nocopy(opt);
00564 }
00565 
00566 PgOpt* PgOptions::defOpt(const std::string& shortName,
00567                          const std::string& longName,
00568                          PgOpt::PgOptType_t type,
00569                          const std::string& help,
00570                          const std::string& defaultValue,
00571                          const bool noHelp)
00572 {
00573   PgOpt* opt=defineOption(shortName,longName,type,help,defaultValue);
00574   return opt;
00575 }
00576 
00577 PgOpt* PgOptions::defOptMult(const std::string& shortName,
00578                              const std::string& longName,
00579                              PgOpt::PgOptType_t type,
00580                              const std::string& help,
00581                              const std::string& defaultValue,
00582                              const bool noHelp)
00583 {
00584   PgOpt* opt=defineOption(shortName,longName,type,help,defaultValue, noHelp);
00585   opt->allowMutipleValues(1);
00586   return opt;
00587 }

00589 void PgOptions::printStringWidth(const std::string& str, int prefix,int currentPos, int maxWidth ) {
00590   Util::printStringWidth(cout, str, prefix, currentPos, maxWidth);
00591 }
00592 
00593 void PgOptions::usage(bool printOpts) {
00594   PgOpt *opt = NULL;
00595   unsigned int maxLength = 0;
00596   unsigned int currentLength = 0;
00597   size_t i = 0;
00598   int extraChars = 6;
00599 
00600   cout << getUsage();
00601   cout << "\n";
00602 
00603   if(printOpts == true) {
00604     /* find the length of the longest option name. */
00605     for (i = 0; i<m_option_vec.size(); i++) {
00606       opt = m_option_vec[i];
00607       // check to see if we're hiding this option.
00608       if(opt->m_nohelp) {
00609         continue;
00610       }
00611       // subtract it off if there is a character.
00612       size_t length = opt->m_longName.size();
00613       if(maxLength < length)
00614         maxLength = (int)length;
00615     }
00616     // extraChars contains a padded space for options without a short flag,
00617     // three ' ' at the beginning and one ' ' at end.
00618     maxLength += 4 + extraChars;
00619     // cap it
00620     if(maxLength > 26) {
00621       maxLength = 26;
00622     }
00623 
00624     cout << "\noptions:\n";
00625     /* Loop through and print out the help. */
00626     for(i = 0; i<m_option_vec.size(); i++) {
00627       // Do we have a section header to print?
00628       if(m_option_section.find(i) != m_option_section.end())
00629           cout << " " << m_option_section[i] << "\n";
00630 
00631       // print out the option
00632 
00633       opt = m_option_vec[i];
00634       // check to see if we're hiding this option.
00635       if(opt->m_nohelp) {
00636         continue;
00637       }
00638       // we might have a short name.
00639       if(opt->m_shortName != "") {
00640         cout <<  "   -" << opt->m_shortName << ", ";
00641       }
00642       else {
00643         cout << "     ";
00644       }
00645       // we always have a long name.
00646       cout << "--" << opt->m_longName << " ";
00647 
00648       while(currentLength < maxLength) {
00649         cout.put(' ');
00650         currentLength++;
00651       }
00652       
00653       printStringWidth(opt->m_help + " [default '" + opt->m_defaultValue + "']",
00654                        maxLength, currentLength);
00655       cout << "\n";
00656     }
00657   }
00658 }
00659 
00660 int PgOptions::parseArgv(const char * const * const argv, int start) {
00661   assert(argv!=NULL);
00662   setArgv(argv);
00663 
00664   // Loop through and match options with arguments.
00665   size_t arg_idx=start;
00666   while (arg_idx<m_argv.size() && m_argv[arg_idx] != "--") {
00667     matchOneArg(&arg_idx);
00668   }
00669   if ( m_pXMLAppendOpts != NULL ) {
00670 
00671     for (size_t i=0;i<m_option_vec.size();i++) {
00672       PgOpt *opt = m_option_vec[i];
00673       if ( ! opt->isSet() ) {
00674         PgOpt *optAppend = m_pXMLAppendOpts->mustFindOpt(opt->m_longName);
00675         if ( optAppend->isSet() ) {
00676           Verbose::out(1, opt->m_longName + " using XML file value...");
00677           m_option_vec[i] = new PgOpt(*optAppend);
00678           m_option_map[opt->m_longName] = m_option_vec[i];
00679           delete opt;
00680         }
00681       }
00682       else {
00683         Verbose::out(1,opt->m_longName + " using command line value...");
00684       }
00685     }
00686     
00687     delete m_pXMLAppendOpts;
00688     m_pXMLAppendOpts = NULL;
00689   }
00690   // dump the values at the end.
00691   // dump(); // debug
00692   return (int)arg_idx;
00693 }
00694 
00695 void PgOptions::resetToDefaults() {
00696   for (size_t i=0;i<m_option_vec.size();i++) {
00697     m_option_vec[i]->resetToDefault();
00698   }
00699   m_argv.resize(0);
00700   m_args.resize(0);
00701 }
00702 
00703 void PgOptions::dump() {
00704   for (size_t i=0;i<m_option_vec.size();i++) {
00705     m_option_vec[i]->dump();
00706   }
00707   printf("Args:\n");
00708   for (size_t i=0;i<m_args.size();i++) {
00709     printf("  %3d : %s\n",(int)i,m_args[i].c_str());
00710   }
00711 }
00712 
00713 void PgOptions::matchOneArg(size_t* arg_idx)
00714 {
00715   PgOpt *opt;
00716   std::string arg_opt;
00717   std::string arg_val;
00718   int have_arg_val=0;
00719   size_t idx;
00720 
00721   if (!(*arg_idx<m_argv.size())) {
00722     Err::errAbort("out of bounds");
00723   }
00724 
00725   //printf(">> %3d : %s\n",*arg_idx,m_argv[*arg_idx].c_str()); // debug
00726   arg_opt=m_argv[*arg_idx];
00727   *arg_idx+=1;
00728 
00729   // No leading "-"; Add it to the args vec...
00730   if (arg_opt[0]!='-') {
00731     m_args.push_back(arg_opt);
00732     return;
00733   }
00734 
00735   // "--" terminates options; Everything following "--" is an args.
00736   if (arg_opt=="--") {
00737     while (*arg_idx<m_argv.size()) {
00738       m_args.push_back(m_argv[*arg_idx]);
00739       *arg_idx+=1;
00740     }
00741     return;
00742   }
00743 
00744   // strip off "-" or "--"
00745   if (arg_opt[0]=='-') {
00746     if (arg_opt[1]=='-') {
00747       arg_opt.erase(0,2); // "--"
00748     }
00749     else {
00750       arg_opt.erase(0,1); // "-"
00751     }
00752   }
00753   else { // no "-" shouldnt happen.
00754     Err::errAbort("Argument does not have a starting dash: '"+arg_opt+"'");
00755   }
00756 
00757   // split on "=" for 'opt=val'...
00758   idx=arg_opt.find("=");
00759   if (idx!=std::string::npos) {
00760     have_arg_val=1;
00761     arg_val.assign(arg_opt,idx+1,arg_opt.size()-(idx+1));
00762     arg_opt.erase(idx); // erase "=..."
00763   }
00764 
00765   // should have something left
00766   if (arg_opt=="") {
00767     Err::errAbort("Shouldnt have a blank argument.");
00768   }
00769 
00770   // Might this be a negated arg? (like "--no-print"?)
00771   if (arg_opt.find("no-")==0) {
00772     string arg_opt_no=arg_opt;
00773     arg_opt_no.erase(0,3);
00774     opt=findOpt(arg_opt_no);
00775     if (opt!=NULL) {
00776       if (opt->m_type!=PgOpt::BOOL_OPT) {
00777         Err::errAbort("Cant use '--no-' with '"+arg_opt_no+"': Not a boolean option.");
00778       }
00779       opt->setValue("false");
00780       return;
00781     }
00782     // didnt find it, treat it as a normal option.
00783   }
00784 
00785   opt = findOpt(arg_opt);
00786   if(opt == NULL) {
00787     Err::errAbort("Don't recognize option: '" + arg_opt + "'");
00788   }
00789 
00790 //  if (*arg_idx<m_argv.size()) {
00791 //    printf("   %3d : %s\n",*arg_idx,m_argv[*arg_idx].c_str()); // debug
00792 //  }
00793 
00794   if (opt->m_type == PgOpt::BOOL_OPT) {
00795     // --foo=bar
00796     if (have_arg_val==1) {
00797       opt->checkParseIsOk(arg_val);
00798       opt->setValue(arg_val);
00799     }
00800     // we might have a following "true/false"...
00801     // "--foo true"
00802     else {
00803       if (*arg_idx<m_argv.size()) {
00804         bool success;
00805         // printf("test: m_argv[%d] = '%s'\n",*arg_idx,m_argv[*arg_idx].c_str()); // debug
00806         Convert::toBoolCheck(m_argv[*arg_idx], &success);
00807         if (success) {
00808           opt->setValue(m_argv[*arg_idx]);
00809           *arg_idx+=1;
00810         }
00811         else {
00812           // didnt look like a bool, use 
00813                         opt->setValue("true");
00814         }
00815       }
00816       // just "program --foo"
00817       else {
00818         opt->setValue("true");
00819       }
00820     }
00821     //
00822     return;
00823   }
00824 
00825   // Do we take the next value?
00826   if (have_arg_val==0) {
00827     if (*arg_idx<m_argv.size()) {
00828       arg_val=m_argv[*arg_idx];
00829       *arg_idx+=1;
00830     }
00831     else {
00832       arg_val="";
00833     }
00834   }
00835 
00836   // Add the value
00837   if (opt->checkParseIsOk(arg_val)==1) {
00838     if (opt->m_allowMultiple==1) {
00839       opt->pushValue(arg_val);
00840     }
00841     else {
00842       if ((opt->m_longName == "xml-file") || (opt->m_longName == "xml-file-append-only")) {
00843                 bool append_only = false;
00844                 if (opt->isSet()) {Err::errAbort("An xml-file option has already been set. Only one xml-file option can be specified.");}
00845                 if (opt->m_longName == "xml-file-append-only" ) {
00846                   PgOpt *xmlFileOpt = mustFindOpt("xml-file");
00847                   if (xmlFileOpt->isSet() ){Err::errAbort("An xml-file option has already been set. Only one xml-file option can be specified.");}
00848                   xmlFileOpt->setValue(arg_val);
00849                   append_only = true;
00850                 }
00851                 std::vector<std::string> vFileNames;
00852                 if ( append_only ) {
00853                   Verbose::out(1, "Creating XML append options.");
00854                   m_pXMLAppendOpts = new PgOptions(*this);
00855                   m_pXMLAppendOpts->setOptionsFromXMLFile(arg_val, vFileNames);
00856                 }
00857                 else {
00858                   setOptionsFromXMLFile(arg_val, vFileNames);
00859                 }
00860           }
00861       opt->setValue(arg_val);
00862     }
00863   }
00864   else {
00865     Err::errAbort("bad parse setting '" + arg_opt +"' to '" + arg_val + "'");
00866   }
00867 }
00868 
00869 void PgOptions::clear(const std::string &name)
00870 {
00871     mustFindOpt(name)->clearValues();
00872 }
00873 
00874 bool PgOptions::getBool(const std::string& opt_name)
00875 {
00876   PgOpt *opt = mustFindOpt(opt_name);
00877   return opt->getValueBool(0);
00878 }
00879 double PgOptions::getDouble(const std::string& opt_name)
00880 {
00881   PgOpt *opt = mustFindOpt(opt_name);
00882   return opt->getValueDouble(0);
00883 }
00884 int PgOptions::getInt(const std::string& opt_name)
00885 {
00886   PgOpt *opt = mustFindOpt(opt_name);
00887   return opt->getValueInt(0);
00888 }

00890 //////////
00891 
00892 int PgOptions::argc() {
00893   return (int)m_argv.size();
00894 }
00895 std::string PgOptions::argv(int idx) {
00896   return m_argv[idx];
00897 }
00898 
00899 /**
00900  * Load parameters from an XML file.
00901  * 
00902  * @param strFileName - The name of the XML file to load parameters from.
00903  */
00904 void PgOptions::setOptionsFromXMLFile(const std::string& strFileNameIn, std::vector<std::string>& vFileNames)
00905 {
00906 #ifndef APT_PGOPTIONS_NO_XERCES
00907         AffxString strFileName = strFileNameIn;
00908 
00909         Verbose::out(1, "*");
00910         Verbose::out(1, "Loading options from file: " + strFileName);
00911                 
00912         if (vFileNames.size() > 7) {Err::errAbort("Possible run away recursion situation found in PgOptions::setOptionsFromXMLFile(...)");}
00913         for (int iIndex = 0; (iIndex < (int)vFileNames.size()); iIndex++)
00914         {
00915                 if (Fs::basename(strFileName) == vFileNames[iIndex]) {Err::errAbort("Possible run away recursion situation found in PgOptions::setOptionsFromXMLFile(...)");}
00916         }
00917         vFileNames.push_back(Fs::basename(strFileName));
00918         
00919         if (m_strXMLParameterFileName == "")
00920         {
00921                 m_strXMLParameterFileName = strFileName;
00922         }
00923         // Initialize the XML4C system
00924         try
00925         {
00926                 XERCES_CPP_NAMESPACE::XMLPlatformUtils::Initialize();
00927         }
00928 
00929         catch (const XERCES_CPP_NAMESPACE::XMLException& toCatch)
00930         {                                       
00931                 Err::errAbort("PgOptions::setParametersFromXMLFile() failed at XMLPlatformUtils::Initialize(). Msg: " + PgOptionsSAXHandler::toString(toCatch.getMessage()) + " FileName: " + strFileName);
00932         }
00933         
00934         //
00935         //  Create a SAX parser object to use and create our SAX event handlers
00936         //  and plug them in.
00937         //
00938         XERCES_CPP_NAMESPACE::SAXParser* parser = new XERCES_CPP_NAMESPACE::SAXParser;
00939         PgOptionsSAXHandler handler(this, vFileNames);
00940         parser->setDocumentHandler(&handler);
00941         parser->setErrorHandler(&handler);
00942         parser->setValidationScheme(XERCES_CPP_NAMESPACE::SAXParser::Val_Auto);
00943         parser->setDoNamespaces(false);
00944         parser->setDoSchema(false);
00945         parser->setValidationSchemaFullChecking(false);
00946         
00947         //
00948         //  Ok, lets do the progressive parse loop. On each time around the
00949         //  loop, we look and see if the handler has found what its looking
00950         //  for. When it does, we fall out then.
00951         //
00952         unsigned long duration;
00953     int errorCount = 0;
00954         try
00955         {
00956                 // Create a progressive scan token
00957                 XERCES_CPP_NAMESPACE::XMLPScanToken token;
00958                 const unsigned long startMillis = XERCES_CPP_NAMESPACE::XMLPlatformUtils::getCurrentMillis();
00959                 try
00960                 {
00961                         XMLCh* p = XERCES_CPP_NAMESPACE::XMLString::transcode(strFileName.c_str());
00962                         try
00963                         {
00964                                 XERCES_CPP_NAMESPACE::URLInputSource source(p);
00965                                 if (!parser->parseFirst(source, token))
00966                                 {
00967                                         Err::errAbort("PgOptions::setParametersFromXMLFile() Cannot open or parse xml-file. FileName: " + strFileName);
00968                                 }
00969                         }
00970                         catch(...)
00971                         {                               
00972                                 XERCES_CPP_NAMESPACE::LocalFileInputSource source(p);
00973                                 if (!parser->parseFirst(source, token))
00974                                 {
00975                                         Err::errAbort("PgOptions::setParametersFromXMLFile() Cannot open or parse xml-file. FileName: " + strFileName);
00976                                 }
00977                         }
00978                         XERCES_CPP_NAMESPACE::XMLString::release(&p);
00979                         //
00980                         //  We started ok, so lets call scanNext() until we find what we want
00981                         //  or hit the end.
00982                         //
00983                         bool gotMore = true;
00984                         while (gotMore && !parser->getErrorCount())
00985                         {
00986                                 gotMore = parser->parseNext(token);
00987                         }
00988 
00989                         const unsigned long endMillis = XERCES_CPP_NAMESPACE::XMLPlatformUtils::getCurrentMillis();
00990                         duration = endMillis - startMillis;
00991 
00992                         errorCount = parser->getErrorCount();
00993                         //
00994                         //  Reset the parser-> In this simple progrma, since we just exit
00995                         //  now, its not technically required. But, in programs which
00996                         //  would remain open, you should reset after a progressive parse
00997                         //  in case you broke out before the end of the file. This insures
00998                         //  that all opened files, sockets, etc... are closed.
00999                         //
01000                         parser->parseReset(token);
01001                 }
01002                 catch (const XERCES_CPP_NAMESPACE::XMLException& toCatch)
01003                 {
01004                         Err::errAbort("PgOptions::setParametersFromXMLFile() failed with an XMLException. Msg: " + PgOptionsSAXHandler::toString(toCatch.getMessage()) + " FileName: " + strFileName);
01005                 } 
01006                 catch(...) {Err::errAbort("PgOptions::setParametersFromXMLFile() Exception thrown while parsing xml-file. FileName: " + strFileName);}
01007         }
01008         catch (const XERCES_CPP_NAMESPACE::OutOfMemoryException&)
01009         {               
01010                 delete parser;
01011                 XERCES_CPP_NAMESPACE::XMLPlatformUtils::Terminate();                    
01012                 Err::errAbort("PgOptions::setParametersFromXMLFile() failed with an OutOfMemoryException. FileName: " + strFileName);
01013         }
01014         catch (const XERCES_CPP_NAMESPACE::XMLException& toCatch)
01015         {
01016                 delete parser;
01017                 XERCES_CPP_NAMESPACE::XMLPlatformUtils::Terminate();
01018                 Err::errAbort("PgOptions::setParametersFromXMLFile() failed with an XMLException. Msg: " + PgOptionsSAXHandler::toString(toCatch.getMessage()) + " FileName: " + strFileName);
01019         }
01020         
01021 //      Verbose::out(1, "XMLFileName = " + strFileName + ", OptionCount = " + ToStr(handler.getOptionCount()));
01022         Verbose::out(1, "*");
01023         delete parser;
01024         XERCES_CPP_NAMESPACE::XMLPlatformUtils::Terminate();
01025         vFileNames.pop_back();
01026 #endif
01027 }
